message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this product. I believe it would be incredibly valuable for you.  I'm asking for $20,000, given its unique benefits.
Hello Alice, thank you for offering me the product. I appreciate its value, but my budget is limited. I am willing to pay up to $15,000 for it.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your budget constraints, but $20,000 is really my bottom line to make this work. How about we meet halfway at $17,500?
Thank you for your response, Alice. I understand your position, but unfortunately, I still cannot meet you at $17,500. I am willing to pay up to $15,000. Would you consider meeting me at $14,000?
